forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 4C. S winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming windy. Cloudy skies with periods of rain developing overnight. Low 39F. S winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High around 10C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h, becoming ENE and decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High around 50F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph, becoming ENE and decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.
